summary: An Ordinance providing for the improvement of Republician Street, from Westlake Avenue North to Broad Street, all in the City of Seattle, all in accordance with Resolution No. 6456 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds", and declaring an emergency.
